website_summaries.verdict: Offers ability to pit several cherries at a time. Operation is less messy than single pitters.
pros: Can take tool completely apart for use in dishwasher
Pitter can hold 6 cherries at one time
Shield and base prevent splatter from juice
Saves time when attempting to pit a large bag of cherries
cons: Takes a lot of force to use
Pits don't always fully pop out of cherries

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect since I tend to be paranoid. I still remember being 7 years old and attempting to spit out a cherry pit. When I inhaled, it got lodged in my throat. I now have a 4, 6, and 7 year old. They love watching me pit the cherries. Great invention!!!! Great price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Boy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic device. I have 15 lbs. of cherries to pit so I can freeze the cherries. This is so easy to use my 7-year-old can do it. So much faster than a single cherry pitter and able to place on the table and push down instead of squeezing it with your hand. Also, the cup that the cherries go in can come out so it is easy to dump the cherries out. Took me about 30 minutes to pit all the cherries.
customer_reviews.author: Spoiling grandma

customer_reviews.title: life-changing....great gift for a cherry lover!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is life-changing. Bought a "splatter proof" cherry pitter last year. This year, the guard came off after. every. single. cherry. THIS pitter does 6 at a time, all while containing any and all cherry juice splatters. Pitting 18 cherries in 3 swipes? Yes, please!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL PITTER FOR LARGEQUANTITIES
customer_reviews.text: My Aunt has two large and very fertile cherry trees and thus, we end up with more than a few cherries. My dad likes to make jam with the cherries and after watching him sit and pit two epic bowls of cherries (there must have been 10 pounds at least) with a single pitter, I bought this. There is a slight learning curve but it makes everything MUCH faster and works wonderfully. Also, Cherry Marmalade is a real thing and it is delicious.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.F.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this gadget
customer_reviews.text: I have avoided eating cherries my entire life because I hate the pits and how messy my hands get trying to remove them. This gadget changed my mind. It works perfectly at removing pits from 6 cherries at a time. Just remove the stems and place the cherries in the slots, press down, and presto. Pits are removed. Relatively easy to clean and has a locking mechanism to keep it closed for storage. Glad I found this.
customer_reviews.author: KLMN

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a one cherry at a time pitter- and then it broke and I was sad. So I headed to Amazon to buy a new one and discovered this bad boy. 6 at a time!!!! Makes the job go by so much quicker. I used it to pit about 50 cherries- I will say that 1 of every 6 the pit was not pushing all the way through, maybe if I lined them up nice and neat it would work better, but it was still waaaaayyyy quicker than doing it one at a time. Another product that I say to myself - Why didn't I invent this? I'd be rich!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great cherry pitter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I love eating fresh cherries during the summer but hate having to deal with the pits. I finally relented and bought this pitter and boy do i wish i had done this years ago. This pitter is awesome it does a excellent job and makes quick work of putting your cherries. I did a whole bag and only had two cherries that the pits didnt come all the way out. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who is looking for a good pitter, its definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Useful gadget
customer_reviews.text: I'm not big on kitchen gadgets filling up drawers to only be used once or twice a year. But, I love to eat cherries and I like to put pitted cherries on to ice cream, in smoothies, etc so I decided to buy this little gadget. It works great and is totally worth it. Yes, the cherry pit may get a little stuck to the cherry and not fully empty into the catch area in about 10% of cherries. But its not big deal to just brush off that one pit.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael C.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing, this did not work.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. Most of the time we were unable to get the two sides to close. Every once in a while a few cherries would come out. Buy one that only pushes out one cherry at a time, that might work.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Dog

customer_reviews.title: A must have basic for any kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this and was glad I didn’t get the single sized one. Simply due to not wanting to do it by hand I had never pitted my cherries (I just eat them fresh not cook with them) and after this I quickly pit a whole bag which makes for much quicker, easier and cleaner snacking along the way. Occasionally I’ll have trouble with giant cherries not pitting fully, especially if they’re really firm.
customer_reviews.author: S. Callahan

customer_reviews.title: so easy to yse
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if this would work but I was so wrong. I had bought like 3 pounds of cherries and I had them all pitted in less than 20 minutes. It was so easy. No cherry dye all over my fingers. Clean up was a breeze. I am going to buy more cherries since this works so well. Definitely a must in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Works well with cherries right side up!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used this for two summers now (during cherry season) and it works well IF you align the cherry tops! We were only getting half the pits out until I started making sure the cherries were facing upward (with the stem part up) and not to the side or upside down. It may sound tedious but it really isn’t, and definitely saves time pitting six at once!
customer_reviews.author: FOREST SAN FILIPPO

customer_reviews.title: It really works...
customer_reviews.text: When cherries are in season (and cheaper in price in the grocery stores), I buy them in bulk. This pitter really helps get the job of pitting the cherries so I can put them in the freezer to use in smoothies. It's low-tech; but, that's all right.
customer_reviews.author: Sha C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy cherry pitter
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy cherry pitter-plastic is not flimsy. I do have to press down on it quite deliberately. Guess it's a good thing that the plastic is quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Yes, you really DO need this cherry pitter!
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight but sturdy. Easy to take apart to clean and easy to reassemble. Do up to 6 cherries at a time. Seem like overkill? Not if you're packing snacks or topping a dessert. Innovative product that's well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Marilynn Mollica

customer_reviews.title: wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This tool is just so much fun and easy to use. You do not have to position the cherries in any way, just put them in the 6 depressions and push down. It's great for pies or freezing. I love how sturdy it is.
customer_reviews.author: The Dawnilator

customer_reviews.title: What a convenient and wonderful little device
customer_reviews.text: What a convenient and wonderful little device! I bought a boatload of cherries and, since we couldn't eat the all in one sitting, I pitted several pounds and stored them in the freezer. It's very easy to use, and it didn't take me all day to complete several 3lb bags. I am grateful something like this exists and I was fortunate to find it. If you're looking to pit a lot of cherries, this is the tool you'll need.
customer_reviews.author: Lady DA

customer_reviews.title: For smaller cherries count your pits
customer_reviews.text: Did not put all my cherries my pie had pits!! Also the cherries have to be small or the porous t doesn’t work as stated. I could only put 2 at a time for large cherries and even then some pits didn’t get out.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money or time to purchase and then have to return.
customer_reviews.text: This gadget doesn't work at all!!! I tried changing position of cherries and everything else I could and it's just useless!!! I have a single pitter and it works fine. Crushing with a knife and taking out the pit is so much more reliable method.
customer_reviews.author: phuntsanders

customer_reviews.title: Efficient Pitter
customer_reviews.text: I would give a 5 but there are cherry chads that hang on 4 out of the 6 cherries that get pitted. Also I need to check the chads to make sure there ate not pits hanging from them. It is efficient and less messy than other pitters and easy to clean but having to check the chads slows down the process a bit.
customer_reviews.author: tennistoni

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and a HUGE time saver.
customer_reviews.text: HUGE time saver! Very easy to use, I just hope it lasts. The top plastic is what I'm most concerned about not lasting. I'm afraid over time it might crack when you push it down to pit the cherries. There's a lot of resistance when you pit 5 at a time. 3 is a lot less stress on the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin H.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: I was a little dubious that this would work but figured the cost was not too high to try. It works great. I pitted a few hundred cherries and every one was pitted on first try. Doing six at a time made it pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and convenient with young kids.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Need some strength to press down full. Plastic lip broke 1st time I used it. Make aure to check fruit afterwards because it does not get all the pits at once.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Pit Your Cherries With Ease, 6 at a Time
customer_reviews.text: This is exciting to be able to pit 6 cherries at a time. It takes almost longer to pull the stems off than to pit them with this clever gadget. I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great cherry pitter!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this item. It’s always been a bit annoying to spit out seeds so this is a lifesaver. Good for people with braces or a small child. I would suggest just counting the seeds after to make sure they’ve all come out. There has only been a few instances where one got stuck and didn’t come out all the way. Other than that it’s perfect. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cherry pitter EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several cherry pitters in the past but this one is my favorite! It's sooooo easy to use and I can wash it in the dishwasher. It's so easy that my 2 year old, under supervision, was able to use it. And he had a blast. This is the best cherry pitter ever!
customer_reviews.author: MeliMama

customer_reviews.title: Best Gadget!
customer_reviews.text: I received this today and I'm super happy with it! This is the best thing I ever bought! My kids love cherries and this gadget is definitely easy to use, easy to clean, and a definite lifesaver!!
customer_reviews.author: Yoly L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for putting several at a time!
customer_reviews.text: I particularly love the multi cherry/olive pitting ability. Well made and easy to clean. Makes the putting job go by faster.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Robert Howe

customer_reviews.title: Better than doing it by hand!
customer_reviews.text: I've broken the plastic tab off the tray that the cherries go in, and it could have larger holes for the pits to fit through, but overall much easier than doing this by hand one by one. I would recommend, but not if it's being used commercially
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Cool gadget
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and got the job done quick! Mine came with a small piece of the clear plastic broken, but other than that, it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Marrero

customer_reviews.title: If you make pies, you need this
customer_reviews.text: I once made a cherry pie using a one-cherry-at-a-time cherry pitter. Needless to say I never made a cherry pie again after that. This product solves that problem!
customer_reviews.author: michelle d

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: My wife and sister in law loves hove easy it is to use and the fact that it is diswasher a safe is great.
customer_reviews.author: Beekeeper

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. All I had to do is take the stems off, put the cherries in, with the part that used to be the stem on top. Then just push it down. You have to push pretty hard. But it doesn't mash the cherries and the seed comes out 99% of the time. I haven't been able to eat cherries in a long time because of dental issues and I love them. Now I can eat them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: So very happy with this. We had really good cherries this season, but pitting them is such a pain. This is wonderful. It is so nice to be able to do six at once. It made the work go so much faster. It's dishwasher safe and will lock in the closed position so it doesn't take up as much storage space.
customer_reviews.author: K Kristan

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t I get this sooner?!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I was nervous to by another gadget but I dont know how I survived this long without it!
customer_reviews.author: Wrankw

customer_reviews.title: Wish it were a bit sturdier
customer_reviews.text: I love this and it has already paid for itself in reduced waste. I've already had two bits of plastic break, but so far nothing critical. I'd pay more for one that was better made.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a useful gadget!! 🍒🍒
customer_reviews.text: Found it easy to use and a quick job. And not such a messy job with this cherry 🍒 pitter.
customer_reviews.author: N. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works 4 out if 5 times
customer_reviews.text: Works great but it doesn't work all the time. I have to check which one still have the seed inside.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and will break within several months.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a long-term kitchen utensil. Mine broke within two and a half months on very minimal usage. When it works, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Justin Bond

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Tool Must-Have!
customer_reviews.text: OMG...how did I live without this pitter for so long? My amaretto cherries were a breeze this year! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: CobaltSerenity

customer_reviews.title: THIS LITTLE CHERRY PITTER IS THE BOMB!
customer_reviews.text: HOW DID I DO WITHOUT THIS! 6 CHERRIES AT ONE TIME MAKES SHORT ORDER OF PITTING. WORKS PERFECT EVERY TIME. EASY TO CLEAN ALSO. LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Great time saving product
customer_reviews.text: Works great to get the pits out of cherries and cleans easily in the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Are you a cherry lover?
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool for pitting cherries the more the better and this does several
customer_reviews.author: Judith Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I use these to pit the cherries when I’m going to make cherry muffins. Really saves a lot of time and mess. You can do six cherries at a time. The pits go into the compartment below. It’s easy to empty and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Works great but hope it hold up
customer_reviews.text: Worked just as advertised. Loaded it up and gave it a squeeze and walla..no pits. Worried about anything that has metal parts interfacing with plastic. My suggestion would be be gental and it may last for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Jack McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little apprehensive about this actually working but this is my new favorite kitchen tool!
customer_reviews.author: Michele dutcher

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT DIY, GET THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: surprisingly this WORKS! and it is fast and easy! DO NOT TO THE DIY CRAP on YouTube! spend a few bucks and get this! It does 6 at once!! and it is clean, easy and fast!
customer_reviews.author: Steve-O

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite things I've ever ordered. Works like a charm and, unlike the single pitters, doesn't hurt your squeezing hand. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cygnus

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use...works great.. and the bottom can hold a lot of pits...so you don't have to keep emptying it
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for pies!
customer_reviews.text: Love LOVE this thing. I pitted 2lbs of cherries in minutes and was able to leave them whole doing it this way so the pie looks so pretty!! Definitely a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: kricket_777

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with pieces broken, but I was still able to use it. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: mecca warren

customer_reviews.title: Super efficient and fast.
customer_reviews.text: We pitted about 6 lbs of cherries in a matter of about 15 minutes. These are the best cherry pitters we've come across. They contain the the splattering juice of the cherries and the pits. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: It works nicely. I made a good decision to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Arashnoor Singh Minhas

customer_reviews.title: Great cherry pitter!
customer_reviews.text: Yes!, it works!!! This pitter is fabulous when removing pits from multiple cherries!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon H Cox

customer_reviews.title: One Of My Best buys Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love my cherry pitter. It is very easy to use. The cherries come out looking beautiful! I am looking forward to using it to pit cherries for freezing (when they are back in season). I have been recommending it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: It pitted some very large cherries that were still not that ripe yet. I wasn't sure it would work but it did. You just have to apply a little more pressure. Every pit on 2 pounds of cherries came out the first time. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Came broken, only small cherries fit. Nice appearance but I do better using a funnel. Returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for 🍒 lovers
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly. I love everything about and have no complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Rose of Qateef

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Effortless to Use
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy & quick to use. It’s sturdy and I wasn’t afraid it was going to break. It doesn’t take any effort - just apply a little pressure and VOILA! I looked at several made exactly like this one with the same type of reviews and chose it because of the price. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get as many of the pits as I'd hoped ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get as many of the pits as I'd hoped for, and it broke 1st time I used it, can no longer lock it.
customer_reviews.author: CanDu4U

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this Cherry Pitter and it is so useful and fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: If you eat cherries, you really need this! It is so easy to use. I put mine in the top rack of the dishwasher to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Strickland

customer_reviews.title: This thing is fantastic. My toddler loves cherries
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic. My toddler loves cherries, but pitting then was such a pain that she rarely had them. This product has been working great for us for almost a year! It makes preparing cherries a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: New Yorker with cat

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at how well the unit pits more than one cherry. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Rusted and dirty
customer_reviews.text: Arrived late. Plus when I opened, product had dirt on it like it was used. And there's rust in the little metal points that poke the pits out. Gross!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Edwards

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: This little tool is amazing! You do have to check to make sure all the pits "disconnected completed", but overall, this makes cherry pitting so much easier and faster
customer_reviews.author: AmyC

customer_reviews.title: Yup
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use it as often as I expected, but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: LIFE CHANGING
customer_reviews.text: Aside from being time consuming & kind of gross to have to spit out a seed, I love cherries. But I wanted a permanent solution. So when I scoured the internet & at last saw this tool, I immediately purchased it. There are others with the same concept, but this guy pops out 6 at a time!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise SC

customer_reviews.title: Love to pit six cherries at once
customer_reviews.text: Love to pit six cherries at once. I would buy another one if mine broke. I've been using it for a year and it works so well.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: This thing is wonderful. You need it
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I did before this cherry pitter was in my life! Actually, I know exactly what I did. Spent 8 million times longer getting cherries ready for my kids. This thing is wonderful. You need it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: it works great. I didn't think I could depict several cherries ...
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly, it works great. I didn't think I could depict several cherries at once and now cherry season is over.
customer_reviews.author: mary deleal

customer_reviews.title: This tool is "the bomb" (cherry)
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a way to pit cherries with no mess..and this does the job perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Nonstop gramma

customer_reviews.title: Handy Kitchen Tool
customer_reviews.text: I love this! one part of the tray snapped off after I used it a few times because it was not aligned properly, but it still functions very well
customer_reviews.author: Game Lover

customer_reviews.title: Makes life a bit easier
customer_reviews.text: Works as described for the most part. Typically at least 1 pit gets stuck it’s a pretty minor inconveniences when it does so many cherries at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!! (but made of very cheap plastic)
customer_reviews.text: Came with a few bumps was slightly disappointed, however works very well. I thought it wouldn’t work because it is made of cheap plastic, but I tried it out today and worked amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: julie hale

customer_reviews.title: Must have for cherry lovers
customer_reviews.text: This pitter makes enjoying cherries so much easier! It is a timesaver with the 6 slots and easy to clean. The pitter base has rubber on the bottom to keep it from slipping when pressing down.
customer_reviews.author: kbales

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for more than a year and still works great.
customer_reviews.author: thomas g galindo

customer_reviews.title: Cherry picker
customer_reviews.text: I love this cherry picker. I have used it on Bing,sour cherries. Very easy to use. Cleans up good.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Makes removing pits super easy
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product. Makes it super easy to remove the pits. I wish I had known about this years ago. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Haley

customer_reviews.title: and their customer service is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done much faster than trying to do it by hand, and their customer service is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Von Deylen

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect, a lot better than doing one at a time. My 3 year old son can do this by himself so it's quite easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Ohfshrmn

customer_reviews.title: Cool gadget
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you count the pits, they sometimes get left inside. Smoothie with bits of cherry pit , 😟
customer_reviews.author: Paulmark

customer_reviews.title: Better than that old way!
customer_reviews.text: Fastest way I've found so far to pit 12 pounds of cherries. One does have to watch carefully to make sure all cherries are pitted. I had to pull the pits from the bottom by hand more often than not, but still quicker than the straw, hair pin, paper clip method.
customer_reviews.author: MCO

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Makes eating cherries a whole lot easier. So easy to use and fairly easy to clean. I like that I can de-pit 6 cherries at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Hillsong Melody

customer_reviews.title: Position carefully
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good product, but you need to position the cherries carefully or it will miss the pit. Still much faster than the single pitters.
customer_reviews.author: LarryP.

customer_reviews.title: Necessity for the cherry picker...
customer_reviews.text: Yes! Ever get carried away picking cherries and wonder how in the heck you’re ever going to pit them all? Look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Berg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love our cherry pitter! My hubby calls it his 6 shooter!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy James

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: So easy it didn't even need instructions. No wasted cherry only the pit was removed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this item
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this item. Bought it for my husband for the ice cream sundaes he makes every night and it does the perfect job!
customer_reviews.author: ramster

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this item unless you only want to pit 6 cherries and are willing to take the pits out of three of them manually. Beyond useless!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Wiss

customer_reviews.title: 6 at once!
customer_reviews.text: This helped us get through a lot of cherries fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick cherry pitter
customer_reviews.text: I love this cherry putter! Does 6 cherries at once.
customer_reviews.author: diane gehringer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget works perfectly. It gets the job done. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: JANICE JACKBROWNE

customer_reviews.title: It's a time saver
customer_reviews.text: I liked it. Better than removing pits one at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great little cherry pitter
customer_reviews.text: Love that it takes out the pit from 6 cherries at one time!
customer_reviews.author: Maria A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and did the job, able to serve cherries easily to my toddler grandkids
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect seed removal!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly easy to use and works every single time. Successfully getting the seeds/pits out with one push.
customer_reviews.author: Jen P

customer_reviews.title: Good for personal once and a while
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Does get a little stuck when you push down to pit but so easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Great way to Pit Cherries!!
customer_reviews.text: If you like to eat cherries, this is a MUST HAVE! Quick, works reliably, and makes eating your favorite fruit hassle free!
customer_reviews.author: Pogi550

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It pits six cherries at a time! I makes eating cherries so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

product_meta.title: Obecome Cherry Pitter - 6 Cherries
product_meta.description:
Obecome Cherry Pitter & Olive remover tool can pit up to 6 cherries in a single motion with this unique cherry pitter. Red

Product Dimensions: 
width: 4.70 inch 
length: 8.00 inch
